us.hourgeon.jmessenger.client

Class ChatWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.hourgeon.jmessenger.client.ChatWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelEvents, ContactEvents, MessageEvents

    public class ChatWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageEvents, ChannelEvents, ContactEvents

    This class implements all of the logic for the main interfaces, including the management of the websocket and the messages

        Specified by:
        onCreateRequest in interface ChannelEvents
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the channel
        invites - A list of User to add to the authorized list for the new channel
        isDirect - True if the channel is a conversation
        isPrivate - True if the channel is private
